name: Sorcerer
lore: Sorcerers wield innate magic, tapping into their supernatural ancestry to cast powerful spells.

subclasses.name: Draconic Bloodline
subclasses.description: Blessed with the blood of dragons, Sorcerers of this lineage manifest draconic traits and wield elemental powers.

subclasses.name: Wild Magic
subclasses.description: Channeling chaotic energies, Wild Magic Sorcerers can produce unexpected magical effects, both beneficial and unpredictable.

subclasses.name: Divine Soul
subclasses.description: With divine heritage, Divine Soul Sorcerers blend arcane magic with divine magic, capable of healing and protecting allies.
